name: PCR Data Quality System
description: Data quality level and criteria of the UN Environment Global Guidance on LCA database development. Table E.1 in EN 15804:2012 + A2:2019.

scores.label: Poor
scores.description: Technology aspects are different from what described in the title and metadata. Requires major improvements.

scores.label: Very good
scores.description: Technology aspects have been modelled exactly as described in the title and metadata, without any significant need for improvement.

scores.label: Very poor
scores.description: Technology aspects are completely different from what described in the title and metadata. Substantial improvement is necessary.

scores.label: Good
scores.description: Technology aspects are very similar to what described in the title and metadata with need for limited improvements. For example: use of generic technologies’ data instead of modelling all the single plants.

scores.label: Fair
scores.description: Technology aspects are similar to what described in the title and metadata but merits improvements. Some of the relevant processes are not modelled with specific data but using proxies.

scores.label: Poor
scores.description: Data are not older than 10 years as expressed in the ILCD field (“data set valid until” and the difference between the “valid until” and the “reference year” is not higher than 8 years, confirmed by the reviewer(s)).

scores.label: Fair
scores.description: Data are not older than 6 years as expressed in the ILCD field (“data set valid until” and the difference between the “valid until” and the “reference year” is not higher than 8 years).

scores.label: Good
scores.description: Data are not older than 3 years as expressed in the ILCD field (“data set valid until” and the difference between the “valid until” and the “reference year” is not higher than 8 years).

scores.label: Very good
scores.description: Data are not older than 0 years as expressed in the ILCD field (“data set valid until” and the difference between the “valid until” and the “reference year” is not higher than 8 years).

scores.label: Very poor
scores.description: Data are older than 10 years as expressed in the ILCD field (“data set valid until” and the difference between the “valid until” and the “reference year” is not higher than 8.

scores.label: Very good
scores.description: The processes included in the data set are fully representative for the geography stated in the “location” indicated in the metadata.

scores.label: Very poor
scores.description: The processes included in the data set are not representative for the geography stated in the “location” indicated in the metadata.

scores.label: Fair
scores.description: The processes included in the data set are sufficiently representative for the geography stated in the “location” indicated in the metadata. E.g. the represented country differs but has a very similar electricity grid mix profile.

scores.label: Poor
scores.description: The processes included in the data set are only partly representative for the geography stated in the “location” indicated in the metadata. E.g. the represented country differs and has a substantially different electricity grid mix profile.

scores.label: Good
scores.description: The processes included in the data set are well representative for the geography stated in the “location” indicated in the metadata.
